flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=810.0>>810.0 RSVP
Of those only 810.0*0.8=<<810.0*0.8=648.0>>648.0 people showed up
So only 648.0-10=<<648.0-10=638.0>>638.0 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180.0, not 810.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
